name: Assault Drone
tooltip: Places an assault drone at the target location. Drone has <d ref="duckiesHeroRykerDrone_Unit.vital_health.maximum" style="Bold"/> life and attacks nearby enemies for <d ref="duckiesHeroRykerDrone_UnitWeaponDamage.amount" style="Blue"/> damage every <d ref="duckiesHeroRykerDrone_UnitWeapon.period"/> seconds. Times out in <d ref="duckiesHeroRykerDrone_TimedLife.duration"/> seconds.
